message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. I'm willing to start with a price of $18000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of $16000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $15000. Can we discuss further?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $15000. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $16500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $14500. Can we discuss further?

I can see you're really pushing the boundaries, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I don't go too low. I'll meet you at $15500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $13500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I can see you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm starting to feel that we're getting too far apart. I'll make one last offer: $14000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I've decided to walk away if I don't get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, but that's my absolute limit. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.
